title: Carve your Initials
text: Normal damage and target suffers from humiliation and may only attack you (Will negates)

title: Missing Digits
text: Normal damage and target loses 1d3 fingers and takes 1 Con and Str drain (Fort negates)

title: Hack and Slash
text: Double damage and all critical threats against target automatically confirm for the next 3 rounds

title: Stand Aside
text: Double damage and push target 1 square in any direction

title: Severed Tendon
text: Normal damage and 1d6 Dex damage

title: Decapitation
text: Double damage and death (Fort negates)

title: Bewildering Display
text: Double damage and target takes a -2 penalty to AC for 1d4 rounds

title: Long Gash
text: Normal damage and 8 bleed. A successful Heal check cuts the bleeding in half, rather than ending it

title: Shattered Jaw
text: Normal damage and 1 Con damage. Target cannot speak or bite until healed

title: Hamstring
text: Normal damage and 1d2 Dex damage and target is knocked prone

title: Brow to Chin
text: Normal damage and 1 Con and Cha damage. -2 penalty on Spot, 1 Search and ranged attacks until healed

title: Gut Slash
text: Double damage and 1d4 bleed. Target cannot swallow whole

title: Wing Tear
text: Double damage and target loses flight if it uses wings

title: Missing Ear
text: Normal damage and 1 Cha drain. -4 penalty on Listen check until healed

title: Wide Open
text: Normal damage and target provokes attacks of opportunity from all threatening opponents

title: We've Got a Bleeder
text: Normal damage and 2d6 bleed

title: Throat Slash
text: Normal damage and 2d6 bleed. Target cannot talk or breathe while bleeding

title: Parrying Strike
text: Double damage and +4 to your AC for 1 round

title: Lean into the Blow
text: Triple damage, but you drop your weapon

title: Flay
text: Normal damage plus 1d6 Str damage

title: Paper Cut
text: Normal damage and -4 penalty on attack rolls, skill checks and ability checks for 1d4 rounds

title: Severed Hand
text: Normal damage and target loses hand and takes 1d3 Con and Str drain (Fort negates)

title: Flat Blade Thwack
text: Triple damage but all damage is nonlethal

title: Surprise Opening
text: Double damage and one free attack against the target with a -5 penalty

title: Broad Swipe
text: Normal damage and 1d8 bleed

title: Disembowel
text: Double damage and 1d4 Con damage and 1d6 bleed

title: Sapping Slash
text: Double damage and target is fatigued

title: Rupture Abdominal Cavity
text: Double damage and 1 Con bleed

title: Muscle Wound
text: Double damage and 1d2 Str damage

title: Fingertipped
text: Normal damage and 1 Dex damage. Target cannot use one hand until healed

title: Bad Parry
text: Double damage and target is disarmed (1 item)

title: Nerve Slice
text: Double damage and target can take only one move or standard action next round

title: Weapon Strike
text: Double damage and normal damage to target's weapon

title: Tangled
text: Double damage and you may automatically grapple the target

title: Momentum
text: Double damage and +2 on all your attack rolls for 1 round

title: Lip Cut
text: Double damage and 1 bleed. Target gains 20% spell failure chance for verbal spells until healed

title: Gory
text: Normal damage and target is sickened for 1d6 rounds

title: Across the Eyes
text: Normal damage and target permanently blinded (Ref negates)

title: Ugly Wound
text: Normal damage and 1d3 Cha damage and 1 Cha drain (Fort negates drain)

title: Knockback
text: Double damage and target is pushed 1d6 squares directly away

title: Pain and Simple
text: Double damage and 2d6 nonlethal damage

title: Cut Straps
text: Double damage and double armor check penalty until fixed (DC 15 Craft)

title: Severed Spine
text: Double damage and 3d6 Dex damage (Fort halves)

title: Overhand Chop
text: Double damage and 1d4 bleed

title: Delayed Wound
text: Normal damage and target takes bleed damage equal to your normal damage

title: Brow Cut
text: Normal damage and 1d4 bleed. Target blinded while bleeding

title: Leg Swipe
text: Double damage and target is knocked prone

title: Terrible Gash
text: Double damage and 1 Cha drain

title: Shield Cleave
text: Double damage and normal damage to target's shield

title: Armor Damage
text: Double damage and normal damage to target's armor

title: Swing Through
text: Double damage and one free attack against an adjacent foe at the same bonus

title: Spun Around
text: Normal damage and target is flat-footed for 1 round
